value.title: Aussie startup Leonardo.Ai leverages AWS to manage explosive growth
value.excerpt: Leonardo.Ai tapped AWS to manage a rapid influx of users on its platform, which its previous cloud provider could not accommodate. The startup migrated its workloads to AWS in less than two weeks, and the resiliency, security, and scalability of AWS's global infrastructure allowed it to efficiently manage the continuous surge in user growth.

value.title: New Amazon Lex AI features aim to let developers quickly build, enhance bots

value.title: AWS, Hoppr Launch Model to Accelerate Generative AI Tools in Medical Imaging
value.excerpt: AI startup Hoppr announced that it teamed up with AWS to launch a new foundation model. The product, named Grace, is a B2B model designed to help application developers build better AI solutions for the medical imaging field — and to build them more quickly.
